Package com.flipkart.dao

Interface BookingDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookingDAO
public interface BookingDAOInterface
Interface for Booking Data Access Object (DAO) operations

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deleteBooking(String bookingId)
    Deletes a booking from the database based on the booking ID
    Booking
    getBookingById(String bookingId)
    Retrieves booking details by booking ID
    List<Booking>
    getBookingsByCustomerId(String customerId)
    Retrieves a list of bookings for a specific customer
    void
    saveBooking(Booking booking)
    Saves a booking to the database
    void
    updateBooking(Booking booking)
    Updates the details of an existing booking in the database

  • Method Details

    • saveBooking

      void saveBooking(Booking booking)
      Saves a booking to the database
      Parameters:
      booking - The booking to be saved

    • getBookingById

      Booking getBookingById(String bookingId)
      Retrieves booking details by booking ID
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The ID of the booking to be retrieved
      Returns:
      Booking details if found, else null

    • updateBooking

      void updateBooking(Booking booking)
      Updates the details of an existing booking in the database
      Parameters:
      booking - The updated booking information

    • deleteBooking

      void deleteBooking(String bookingId)
      Deletes a booking from the database based on the booking ID
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The ID of the booking to be deleted

    • getBookingsByCustomerId

      List<Booking> getBookingsByCustomerId(String customerId)
      Retrieves a list of bookings for a specific customer
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer
      Returns:
      List of bookings made by the customer
